title: Dietary Needs: Requests (Usefulness 9)
description: Traveler usefulness 9/10 phrases for the Requests subcategory within Dietary Needs. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.english: A small serving of noodles please.
cards.japanese: 麺少な目でお願いします。

cards.english: A large serving of rice, please.
cards.japanese: ライス大盛りお願いします。
